trans-unit.source: ADE Repository

seg-source.mrk: ADE Repository

target.mrk: Espace de stockage ADE

trans-unit.source: Adding or removing a repository can also be performed by modifying an environment variable in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">See <MadCap:xref href="Lina_Administration_Console.htm">[%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> for details</MadCap:conditionalText>.

seg-source.mrk: Adding or removing a repository can also be performed by modifying an environment variable in the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">See <MadCap:xref href="Lina_Administration_Console.htm">[%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> for details</MadCap:conditionalText>.

target.mrk: L'ajout ou la suppression d'un espace de stockage peut également se faire dans la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.user" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Voir <MadCap:xref href="Lina_Administration_Console.htm">[%=ALN.ade_admin%]</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails</MadCap:conditionalText>.

trans-unit.source: Add a Repository

seg-source.mrk: Add a Repository

target.mrk: Ajouter un espace de stockage

trans-unit.source: When you add a repository, the existing block files remain in the repository in which they were initially written.

seg-source.mrk: When you add a repository, the existing block files remain in the repository in which they were initially written.

target.mrk: Lorsque vous ajoutez un espace de stockage, les fichiers blocs existants restent dans l'espace de stockage dans lequel ils ont été initialement écrits.

trans-unit.source: You can add repositories, using the repository_path command. Each time a new block file must be written, goes to the next path in the list in a circular fashion.

seg-source.mrk: You can add repositories, using the repository_path command.
Each time a new block file must be written, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> goes to the next path in the list in a circular fashion.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez ajouter des espaces de stockage à l'aide de la commande repository_path.

Chaque fois qu'un nouveau fichier bloc doit être écrit, l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> écrit dans le prochain espace de stockage de la liste, de manière circulaire.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended using local disks to locate the repository.

seg-source.mrk: It is recommended using local disks to locate the repository.

target.mrk: Il est recommandé d'utiliser des disques locaux pour localiser l'espace de stockage.

trans-unit.source: To add a repository:

seg-source.mrk: To add a repository:

target.mrk: Pour ajouter un espace de stockage :

trans-unit.source: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

target.mrk: Arrêtez le service Deduplication Engine (par défaut ADE.default).

trans-unit.source: Launch this command:

seg-source.mrk: Launch this command:

target.mrk: Lancer cette commande :

trans-unit.source: ade_server --repository_path=";;"

seg-source.mrk: ade_server --repository_path=";;"

target.mrk: ade_server --repository_path=";;"

trans-unit.source: Where ; ; is the list of all repository paths in use, including the new one.

seg-source.mrk: Where ; ; is the list of all repository paths in use, including the new one.

target.mrk: Où ; ; est la liste de tous les chemins d'espaces de stockage utilisés, y compris le chemin du nouvel espace.

trans-unit.source: You can write up to 2048 characters when you define the repository paths.

seg-source.mrk: You can write up to 2048 characters when you define the repository paths.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez écrire jusqu'à 2048 caractères lorsque vous définissez les chemins de l'espace de stockage.

trans-unit.source: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

seg-source.mrk: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

target.mrk: Redémarrez le service Deduplication Engine.

trans-unit.source: Remove a Repository

seg-source.mrk: Remove a Repository

target.mrk: Supprimer un espace de stockage

trans-unit.source: The path of a repository can be removed from repository_path.

seg-source.mrk: The path of a repository can be removed from repository_path.

target.mrk: Le chemin d'un espace de stockage peut être supprimé à partir de repository_path.

trans-unit.source: If you remove a repository that already contained backups, the data backed up remains in the repository unless you move the existing block files using one of the commands described in <MadCap:xref href="#aln_admin_1282167276_1069122" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To move an existing repository contents:</MadCap:xref>. Do not manually move block files otherwise <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> loses track of these files.

seg-source.mrk: If you remove a repository that already contained backups, the data backed up remains in the repository unless you move the existing block files using one of the commands described in <MadCap:xref href="#aln_admin_1282167276_1069122" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To move an existing repository contents:</MadCap:xref>.
Do not manually move block files otherwise <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> loses track of these files.

target.mrk: Si vous supprimez un espace de stockage qui contenait déjà des sauvegardes, les données sauvegardées restent dans l'espace de stockage, à moins que vous ne déplaciez les fichiers blocs existants en utilisant l'une des commandes décrites dans <MadCap:xref href="#aln_admin_1282167276_1069122" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">To move an existing repository contents:</MadCap:xref>.
Ne déplacez pas manuellement les fichiers blocs, sinon l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> perd la trace de ces fichiers.

trans-unit.source: To remove a repository:

seg-source.mrk: To remove a repository:

target.mrk: Pour supprimer un espace de stockage :

trans-unit.source: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

target.mrk: Arrêtez le service Deduplication Engine (par défaut ADE.default).

trans-unit.source: Launch this command:

seg-source.mrk: Launch this command:

target.mrk: Exécutez cette commande :

trans-unit.source: ade_server --repository_path=";;>"

seg-source.mrk: ade_server --repository_path=";;>"

target.mrk: ade_server --repository_path=";;>"

trans-unit.source: Where ; ; is the list of all remaining repository paths in use, without the one you want to remove.

seg-source.mrk: Where ; ; is the list of all remaining repository paths in use, without the one you want to remove.

target.mrk: Où ; ; est la liste de tous les chemins d'espaces de stockage restant en cours d'utilisation, en retirant le chemin que vous souhaitez supprimer.

trans-unit.source: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

seg-source.mrk: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

target.mrk: Redémarrez le service Deduplication Engine.

trans-unit.source: Move a Repository

seg-source.mrk: Move a Repository

target.mrk: Déplacer un espace de stockage

trans-unit.source: Moving block files does not create a new repository in the destination location, nor does it remove the source repository. Once block files have been moved, if you do not add a new repository in the new location, the next backup continues using the old repository.

seg-source.mrk: Moving block files does not create a new repository in the destination location, nor does it remove the source repository.
Once block files have been moved, if you do not add a new repository in the new location, the next backup continues using the old repository.

target.mrk: Le fait de déplacer des fichiers de blocs ne crée pas de nouvel espace de stockage dans l'emplacement de destination, ni ne supprime l'espace de stockage source.

Une fois que les fichiers blocs ont été déplacés, si vous n'ajoutez pas un nouvel espace de stockage dans le nouvel emplacement, la prochaine sauvegarde ira copier les nouveaux blocs dans l'espace de stockage source.

trans-unit.source: To move content of an existing repository:

seg-source.mrk: To move content of an existing repository:

target.mrk: Pour déplacer le contenu d'un espace de stockage existant :

trans-unit.source: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

seg-source.mrk: Stop the Deduplication Engine service (by default ADE.default).

target.mrk: Arrêtez le service Deduplication Engine (par défaut ADE.default).

trans-unit.source: You can either :

seg-source.mrk: You can either :

target.mrk: Vous pouvez soit :

trans-unit.source: Move all block files at once, using this command:

seg-source.mrk: Move all block files at once, using this command:

target.mrk: Déplacer tous les fichiers bloc en une seule fois avec la commande :

trans-unit.source: ade_server --mv_blockfiles_dest=

seg-source.mrk: ade_server --mv_blockfiles_dest=

target.mrk: ade_server --mv_blockfiles_dest=

trans-unit.source: Where is the new path.

seg-source.mrk: Where is the new path.

target.mrk: Où est le nouveau chemin.

trans-unit.source: Move the block file by file, using these commands:

seg-source.mrk: Move the block file by file, using these commands:

target.mrk: Déplacer chaque fichier bloc avec la commande suivante :

trans-unit.source: ade_server --mv_blockfile= --mv_blockfiles_dest=

seg-source.mrk: ade_server --mv_blockfile=
--mv_blockfiles_dest=

target.mrk: ade_server --mv_blockfile=
--mv_blockfiles_dest=

trans-unit.source: Where is the name of the block file to move and is the new path.

seg-source.mrk: Where is the name of the block file to move and is the new path.

target.mrk: Où est le nom du fichier bloc à déplacer et est le nouveau chemin.

trans-unit.source: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

seg-source.mrk: Restart the Deduplication Engine service.

target.mrk: Redémarrez le service Deduplication Engine.
